name: Square Cops (Trijam - 3h game)
description:
This is My game that I did in 3 hours for the Trijam game jam.

This is My Second game I have ever made. I got 1,5 months of unity experience and Im happy with what I was able to do in 3 hours.

I wanted to add some sounds and add some light effects and maybe a flashlight for the cop, but  I simply didn't have time for that.

This is a puzzle platformer with not too many levels :)

Level design was the main time consumer as it took almost 1h. And the are still very basic.

Games objective:

You are Square Cops! 

WARNING! Some nasty criminals have escaped the Not so Square Jail!

Your goal is to get all the Square Criminals to Not So Square Jail's door.

Do this by picking up Square Criminals.

You will have to Use the Square assitant or a square criminal to get to the criminals that have gone higher.

Controls: 

Use A and D keys to move

Use Space  to Jump

Use LMB (Left mouse button) to grab your Square assistant or a Square criminal

Click on the visually appealing restart button in the right corner to restart the level if You are stuck.
